articles.title: Amazon Reaches Historic $2.5B Settlement Over Prime Subscription Practices
articles.summary: E-commerce giant **Amazon** has agreed to pay a record **$2.5 billion** settlement to the **Federal Trade Commission** over allegations of deceptive Prime subscription practices. The company was accused of misleading customers during sign-up processes and creating obstacles for cancellations.

articles.title: Second Deadly Prison Riot This Week Rocks Ecuador
articles.summary: A violent uprising at a prison in **Ecuador** has resulted in **17 deaths**, marking the second deadly riot this week. The incident at **Litoral Penitentiary** in **Guayaquil** has prompted immediate deployment of security forces to contain the situation.

articles.title: EU Chief Suggests NATO Could Shoot Down Russian Jets
articles.summary: **European Commission** President **Ursula von der Leyen** has controversially stated that shooting down **Russian** aircraft violating **NATO** airspace is a potential option, following similar remarks by **U.S. President Trump** regarding territorial defense.

articles.title: China Announces First-Ever Absolute Target for Emissions Reduction
articles.summary: **China**, the world's largest carbon emitter, has made a groundbreaking commitment to reduce greenhouse gas emissions by **7-10%** by **2035**. President **Xi Jinping** announced the landmark pledge during a **UN** video statement.

articles.title: Breakthrough Gene Therapy Shows Promise for Huntington's Disease Treatment
articles.summary: Pharmaceutical company **uniQure** has reported successful results from a **Phase 1/2** study of an experimental gene therapy for **Huntington's disease**. The breakthrough treatment demonstrated significant effectiveness in slowing disease progression.

articles.title: CoreWeave Signs Massive $6.5B AI Infrastructure Deal
articles.summary: Cloud infrastructure provider **CoreWeave** has secured a **$6.5 billion** contract with **OpenAI**, expanding their existing partnership. This agreement increases their total contracts with the **ChatGPT** creator to **$22.4 billion**.

articles.title: Poll Reveals Deep Concerns Over American Political Crisis
articles.summary: A new survey shows **80%** of American voters believe the country faces a political crisis, with more than half worried about escalating violence. The poll follows recent political tensions and the assassination of **MAGA** commentator **Charlie Kirk**.

articles.title: Meta's Threads Overtakes X in Global Daily Users
articles.summary: **Meta's** social platform **Threads** has surpassed **Elon Musk's** **X** in daily active mobile users worldwide, marking a significant shift in social media dynamics two years after its launch as an alternative platform.

articles.title: Patriots Owner Sells Minority Stake in Record-Setting Deal
articles.summary: **Robert Kraft** has agreed to sell **8%** of the **New England Patriots** in a deal valuing the team at **$9 billion**. The transaction marks a remarkable return on Kraft's initial **$172 million** investment from 1994.

articles.title: Trump Administration Nears Agreement to Keep TikTok Operating
articles.summary: Former President **Trump** is expected to approve a deal allowing **TikTok** to continue operations in the **United States**. The agreement involves **Oracle** and addresses national security concerns while maintaining the platform's accessibility for American users.

dailyGreeting: Good morning! Historic settlements and breakthroughs shape today's news.

historicalEvents.description: Spanish explorer Balboa first European to see Pacific Ocean
US Congress adopts Bill of Rights
US Congress establishes Sequoia National Park
Central High School in Arkansas integrated despite protests
